      Parameters:

      boxes - Boxes of the map
      Returns:
      Boolean if everything went well
      Throws:
      ChannelClosedException - If connection is lost

      Parameters:
      player - Player that receives the updated map
      boxes - All boxes of the map
      Returns:
      Boolean if everything went well
      Throws:
      ChannelClosedException - If connection is lost

      Parameters:
      player - Asked player
      Returns:
      Boolean that is true if player wants to undo his turn
      Throws:
